search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Shopify (shopify.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official URL to Shopify's pricing page is: [https://www.shopify.com/pricing](https://www.shopify.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Shopify Pricing - Setup and Open Your Online Store Today – Free Trial

extracted_content.content:
Plans & pricing
---------------

Start for free, then enjoy  
$1/month for 3 months

Choose the best plan for your business. Change plans as you grow.

Try Shopify free, no credit card required. By entering your email, you agree to receive marketing emails from Shopify.

\*Yearly discount available on select plans

\*Yearly discount available on select plans

Compare all plan features
-------------------------

Pricing and feature information for all Shopify plans
|  | Basic | Grow | Advanced | Plus |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Pricing |
| 
Pay monthly



 | $39 USD/mo

 | $105 USD/mo

 | $399 USD/mo

 | Starting at$2,300 USD/moon a 3-year term

 |
| 

Pay yearly (Save up to 25%)\*



 | $29 USD/mo\*

 | $79 USD/mo\*

 | $299 USD/mo\*

 |  |
| Core features |
| 

Online store

Easily build an online store. Full features include product collections, informational pages, and blogs.



 | Full-featured

 | Full-featured

 | Full-featured

 | Full-featured

 |
| 

World's best-converting checkout

Equip your store with a world-class checkout that lets customers complete purchases with just one click.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Unlimited products

Sell as many products and services as you want.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Additional staff accounts

Let staff help you run your store and control who has permission to access info—from product pages to customer data.



 |  | 5

 | 15

 | Unlimited

 |
| 

Collaborator accounts

Give 3rd party designers, developers, and marketing experts limited access to your store. (Does not count toward staff account limits.)



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Templates and themes

Easily create polished storefronts and customer messages with business-ready templates and themes.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Sales channels

Promote and sell your products everywhere: on social media, in online marketplaces, through customer chat, and more.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Inventory locations

Track inventory, fulfill orders, and sell products across multiple locations, including retail stores, warehouses, and pop-ups.



 | 10

 | 10

 | 10

 | 200

 |
| 

Analytics

Access 60+ reports to track your store performance or build custom reporting with flexible, real-time analytics.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

24/7 support

Get round-the-clock access to the Shopify support team.



 | Live chat

 | Live chat

 | Enhanced live chat

 | Priority support by phone or live chat

 |
| Hosting and administration |
| 

Unlimited web hosting

Get fast load times and exceptional reliability for your store with unlimited bandwidth and storage.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Custom domain

Use your own existing domain, purchase one through Shopify, or use a free ".myshopify.com" domain.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Free SSL certificate

Get a free site security certificate to encrypt your online store's content and publish it securely.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Organization settings

Manage administrative tasks like staff and billing across multiple Shopify stores.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Checkout capacity

Let more shoppers check out simultaneously during big sales events. Assign anyone who exceeds capacity to a waiting room queue.



 | Standard

 | Standard

 | 10x

 | 40x

 |
| [| In-person selling |](https://www.shopify.com/pos/features)  |
| 

Shopify POS Lite

A lightweight solution for casual selling at pop-ups and markets.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Shopify POS Pro (per location)

Everything POS Lite has to offer, plus faster workflows, more control over staff permissions, and in-depth inventory reporting tools.



 | $89/mo

 | $89/mo

 | $89/mo

 | 20 locations included or 200 with Shopify Payments

 |
| Marketing |
| 

Unlimited contacts

Add unlimited contacts to your Shopify account.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Customer segmentation

Filter and group customers to find and reach exactly the right people.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Shopify Email

Create emails from scratch or from templates, send campaigns, automate emails, and report on results. First 10,000 emails are free each month, with volume discounts on additional emails for higher plans.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Shopify Forms

Attract, acquire, and convert new customers with our free lead capture solution.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Shopify Inbox

Convert more customers through chat, including automated messages.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Marketing automation

Engage customers at every stage of their journey with automated marketing flows. Use pre-made templates or build custom flows that suit your unique business.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Abandoned checkout recovery

Automatically send emails to customers who leave your store without completing checkout.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Discount codes

Offer your customers a fixed value, percentage, or shipping discount on products or collections.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Gift cards

Expand your current customer base and attract new customers by offering gift cards.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Shop Campaigns

Acquire customers at a cost you control with risk-free campaigns. You only pay when a customer converts.



 |  |  |  |  |
| Shopify Payments |
| 

Online standard card rates

Accept all major card brands automatically when your store launches.



 | 2.9% + 30¢

 | 2.7% + 30¢

 | 2.5% + 30¢

 | Most competitive rates

 |
| 

Online premium card rates

Premium includes commercial, corporate, and business cards and all cards issued by American Express.



 | 3.5% + 30¢

 | 3.3% + 30¢

 | 3.1% + 30¢

 | Most competitive rates

 |
| 

Online International card rates



 | \+ 1%

 | \+ 1%

 | \+ 1%

 | Most competitive rates

 |
| 

In-person card rates



 | 2.6% + 10¢

 | 2.5% + 10¢

 | 2.4% + 10¢

 | Most competitive rates

 |
| 

In-person manual credit/debit transaction rates



 | 3.5% + 10¢

 | 3.5% + 10¢

 | 3.5% + 10¢

 | Most competitive rates

 |
| 

Third-party transaction fees if not using Shopify Payments

Third-party transaction fees are charges that apply if you use a third-party provider.



 | 2%

 | 1%

 | 0.6%

 | 0.2%

 |
| 

Fraud analysis

When you use Shopify Payments, get a built-in analysis feature that flags potentially fraudulent orders.



 |  |  |  |  |
| Shopify Shipping |
| 

Shipping discount

Competitive shipping rates from DHL Express, UPS, or USPS.



 | up to 77%

 | up to 88%

 | up to 88%

 | up to 88%

 |
| 

Shipping labels

Buy shipping labels individually or in bulk through Shopify Payments. Print shipping labels using a standard printer.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

USPS small-package discounts

Get discounted rates for smaller/lighter packages with USPS Parcel Select Cubic® and USPS Priority Mail Cubic®.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Shipping insurance

Get up to $200 coverage with each eligible Shopify Shipping label (requires Shopify Payments).



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

3rd-party calculated shipping rates

Show calculated rates with your own account or third-party apps at checkout.



 |  | Additional paid service

 |  |  |
| Shopify Marketplace Connect |
| 

Connect and list products

Connect and list your Shopify products on all supported marketplaces.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Import marketplace orders

Import unlimited orders from marketplaces to Shopify.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

First 50 Shopify-synced orders

Each month, get 50 marketplace orders from Shopify-synced listings for free.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

More than 50 Shopify-synced orders

Get additional orders from Shopify-synced listings for a 1% transaction fee (up to a total maximum of $99 USD per month).



 | 1% up to $99/mo

 | 1% up to $99/mo

 | 1% up to $99/mo

 | 1% up to $99/mo

 |
| Customization |
| 

3rd party app integrations

Manage your unique business with a vast selection of compatible apps.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Ecommerce automations

Automate manual tasks, build workflows, and grow your business with the first built-in ecommerce automation platform.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Custom apps

Build apps using Shopify APIs. For added customization, get API access to personally identifiable information (PII), including customer names, addresses, phone numbers, and email.



 | Limited data access (no PII)

 | Full data access

 | Full data access

 | Full data access

 |
| 

API rate limits

Power your custom or 3rd party apps with flexible integrations.



 | Standard

 | Standard

 | Up to 2x on select APIs

 | Up to 10x on select APIs

 |
| 

Headless storefronts

Build a custom storefront with Hydrogen, Shopify’s React-based toolkit and deploy on Oxygen, Shopify’s free global hosting solution.



 | 1

 | 1

 | 1

 | 25

 |
| [| International |](https://www.shopify.com/international)  |
| 

Language translation

Enable multiple languages on your storefront to reach a global customer base. Includes two free automated translations and flexible integrations with third-party translation services.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Currency conversion

Automatically convert prices into your customer’s local currency to drive conversion in each market (requires Shopify Payments).



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Localized selling with custom markets

Manage global sales all from a single store with our cross-border international sales tools. Target specific countries or regions, offering a customized, high-converting shopping experience.



 | 3 markets included

 | 3 markets included

 | 3 included + $59/mo per added active market

 | 50 markets included

 |
| 

Product pricing by market

Take greater control of your international pricing strategy by setting specific prices for products or product variants in each market.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Local payment methods

Set local payment methods to appear for customers who check out in specific markets (requires Shopify Payments).



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Local domains

Assign custom web addresses for each market that are optimized for local search results. Automatically redirect customers to the right domain or subfolder based on their market.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Duties and import taxes

Estimate and collect duties and import taxes at checkout to give customers total cost clarity.



 |  |  |  |  |
| [| Shopify Tax |](https://www.shopify.com/tax)  |
| 

Sales tax calculation

Automatically collect the right amount of sales tax at checkout based on product-specific rates and your customer's precise address.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Tax liability tracking

Clearly monitor where you may be required to collect sales tax and where you're approaching state thresholds.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Easy product categorization

Review and approve product categories suggested by Shopify, or make edits to ensure the most accurate rates and exemptions are applied to your orders.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Automatic updates

Let Shopify Tax routinely scan for rate changes, regulation updates, and tax holidays, and apply them to your store as needed.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Free for first $100K sales

Get Shopify Tax for free for your first $100,000 in US sales per year. After $100,000 you only pay a small transaction fee when sales tax is calculated.



 | First $100K free, 0.35% after

 | First $100K free, 0.35% after

 | First $100K free, 0.35% after

 | First $100K free, 0.25% after

 |
| 

Tax Platform

Calculate accurate taxes on every order based on the most up-to-date tax rules.



 | Additional paid service

 | Additional paid service

 | Additional paid service

 | Additional paid service

 |
| Just for Plus

 |
| 

Checkout customizations

Convert more buyers with advanced customizations to Shopify Checkout using powerful apps and branding tools.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

B2B on Shopify

Sell wholesale and DTC, integrated in one admin and store.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Shopify Audiences

Find high-intent customers at lower cost.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Free expansion stores

Set up additional stores under the same brand for the purpose of selling in different languages or currencies.



 |  |  |  | 9

 |
| 

Bot protection

Protects your online store from bots during flash sales.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Exclusive API access and endpoints

Build complex integrations with APIs and get up to 500% higher API call limits.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Feature test drives

Control the release of new features to your stores to ensure your workflows and API integrations keep functioning smoothly.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Launchpad

Schedule automated promotions, product releases, and online store updates.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Custom app built with Shopify Functions

Get the freedom to design and deploy flexible personalizations to build commerce experiences as unique as your brand with Shopify Functions.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Custom user groups

Group users with similar roles together to assign permissions in bulk, making it easy to onboard new team members or transition roles within your organization.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Shopify Plus Certified App Partners

Use apps that are hand-selected for their quality and ability to solve complex needs.



 |  |  |  |  |
| 

Shopify Plus Academy

Access lessons and courses designed to help you scale on Shopify Plus.

Everything you need to sell online, all in one place

Whether you’re building a website, managing inventory, or responding to customers, you can do it all with Shopify.
